roleset.name: burn brightly
roleset.note: BLAZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blaze' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from blaze.01-v predicate notes)
BLAZE-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparson to blaze.01-v. Blaze.01-v is a member of VN class emission-43.1. Framed by Katie. (from blaze.01-n)

example.name: with source
example.text: Garish neon pachinko marquees blaze from the main streets and narrow alleys of cities and towns across the country.
example.arg: from the main streets and narrow alleys of cities and towns across the country

example.name: blazing saddles
example.text: ``I think Ford is going to come out with full guns blazing,'' Mr. Reitman says.
